attributes.action: The right to charge an electric car at the price of a household
attributes.additional_details:
The law should regulate prices.
In addition, it is important to indicate the payment method, there are 2 options. 1st payment option to the charging station operator, 2nd payment option to the electricity supplier with household bills.
This is an important law that will help develop the network of electric vehicle chargers in our country and increase the number of electric vehicles. It will also help you avoid a lot of wires from home chargers on the streets.
attributes.background: The government should create a law that will regulate the prices at charging stations for users of residential parking at the electricity price of households at a power of 4.5 kW per hour.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see new regulations introduced regarding charges for electric vehicles, but it's not clear if you want these to apply to all electric charging stations, or only those installed at residential addresses.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
